params._executionLockTime: Amount of time for an executor to completely execute a bundle                            after claiming it.
params._owner: Address of the owner of the ChugSplash contracts.
params._ownerBondAmount: Amount that must be deposited in this contract in order to execute                            a bundle.

constructor.notice: Boots an upgradeable version of ChugSplash with a root ChugSplashManager that owns         the ChugSplashRegistry. Once these contracts are deployed, we can upgrade ChugSplash         using ChugSplash!

managerImplementation().notice: Address of the ChugSplashManager implementation contract. All ChugSplashManagerProxy         contracts, including the root contract, will have this address as their         implementation.

registryImplementation().notice: Address of the ChugSplashRegistry implementation contract.
